channel.title: Colorado Free Radio Talk
channel.description:
Free D People is your Host on CFR Talk and brings his own brand of opinion and favorite music to the show. Join Free as he rants and raves on Political, Social, and Current events mixed with outstanding music and comedy by Independent Artists. No One is safe from Free's scrutiny.
This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-No Derivative Works 2.5 License.
To hear archived shows go HERE
channel.itunes:subtitle: Freedom is the right to disagree
channel.itunes:author: Free D People

item.title: Ep 17 CFR's Tribute to George Carlin
item.description: This is s special two hour episode featuring the comedy and raucous wisdom of the late great George Carlin. Your host, Free D People features some of George Carlin's finest, funniest and foulest moments. If you are easily offended WARNING EXPLICIT LANGUAGE!!!
item.dc:creator: Free D People
item.itunes:summary: This is s special two hour episode featuring the comedy and raucous wisdom of the late great George Carlin. Your host, Free D People features some of George Carlin's finest, funniest and foulest moments. If you are easily offended WARNING EXPLICIT LANGUAGE!!!

item.title: C.F.R.Talk - Bushisms and a Tribute to Dr. Martin Luther King
item.description: This show, your host Free D People talks about the Presidential Campaign and the BS coming out of it. Free plays Bushism's and points out the most outrageous comments made by the President over the years. A tribute to DR. Martin Luther King is made with excerpts from his most famous speeches. Free gets in the face of Government, Religon and the FCC. As usual there is good music and a fun time is had by all.
item.dc:creator: Free D People

item.title: Colorado Free Radio Talk Christmas/New Years Show
item.description: Colorado Free Radio Talk's, Christmas-New Years Show, hosted by Free D People. Free comments on China's seemingly mistake to poison American Children and pets. Free also draws a comparison to undocumented workers in America to undocumented Jews of Germany and Poland. Free pays tribute to the passing of two great artists this month, Dan Fogelberg and Floyd Red Crow Westerman. As usual the show is filled with great music and inciting commentary
